Judul: Immortality Sucks! How the Estate of the Artist Writes History
Abstrak: The article examines artists' estates. Particular focus is given to how the estate of artists play a central role in the drafting of historical narratives. Additional topics discussed include how estates control access to archival materials, the estate of artists including Robert Smithson and Ad Reinhardt, and the copyright protection of art.
Sumber: Peter Lamarque, Work and Object: Explorations in the Metaphysics of Art (Oxford, UK: Oxford University Press, 2010)
